General.Name: Guangdong Super Telecom
General.Description: Super Telecom Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides communications technology services in China. The company offers telecommunication technology services, including communication engineering and maintenance, network optimization, and IoT maintenance services; intelligent hardware, such as full-band NB-IoT chip; and IoT solutions comprising intelligent water utilities, gas, energy, fire control, air conditioning control, logistics, manufacture, retail, and agriculture, as well as smart street lamp and elevator safety monitoring solutions. It is also involved in the design and survey of photovoltaic smallcells, which include photovoltaic smallcells and track lighting systems. The company was formerly known as GuangDong Super Telecom Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Super Telecom Co.,Ltd in May 2019. Super Telecom Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
